changelog: Made 100 coins default to 'shuffled' again. Not sure why I changed it.
Swapped order of Caps/Cannons logic in layout.
MIPS I should default to 15 stars instead of 12 stars.
More tweaks to images and layouts.
Area Rando back in one screen again.
Removed logic for managing Bob-omb Buddies, they're now always visible. Temporary workaround for logic not taking them into account when they're not shuffled.
Updated images for moves, blocks, buddies, and settings.
Added a way to track Bowser III kill. Not tracked by AP (yet).
Changed entrance scout-ability shapes to the new trapezoid shape, and requires the newer version of PopTracker.
Fixed a logic bug for 2 locations in BitFS.
Swapped entrances for THI-H and THI-T (again).
Added scout logic for WMotR, TotWC, BitFS, and SA since TTC hands can now show up there.
Reverse the entrances for THIt and THIh on castle map.
Re-add missing rules for Bob-omb Buddy location in RR.
Move 100 coins star location to TTC:Top region to inherit correct rules.
Re-add missing rule for WDW Bob-omb Buddy check.
Fix issue with kick not being detecting from move vector slot data.
Automatically set entrances to defaults if Area Rando is disabled.
Add ability to change entrance when hovering over scout icon (image size still needs work).
Add "blue" level for scout icon for stages like TTC and RR where you could see if TTC hands are present, even if you can't enter the stage
Scout icons automatically hide if no Area Rando.
Tweaks to some names.
Accidentally cleared BitS entrance (and there's no way to set it without resetting all). Wups.
Bug fix from 1.2.2: Fix island access not expecting LJ (was TJ wups).
Overhaul of layout.
Removal of Entrance Randomization toggle (wasn't needed).
Settings for auto-tracking star requirements or entrances when connected to AP server.
New images for moves (credit for which goes to Hartflip0218 on DeviantArt).
Decrease size of locations summary so min window size can be smaller.
Fix issue where entrances would reset if PopTracker was closed.
Fix logic issue with Mario Wings to the Sky not requiring cannon.
Feature: Created a locations tracker that displays all locations in one tab. Does not currently factor in accessibility.
Feature: Add auto-update support.
Refactor: Changed 'Wall Kick' icon to show 'WK' instead of 'WJ'.
Bug Fix: 'Cool, Cool Mountain: Wall Kicks will Work' star no longer shows as always inaccessible.
Feature: Unset accessible entrances show as blue, with a colored icon in the bottom right corner indicating accessibility level
Feature: AP Auto-tracking now detects if 100 coin stars are enabled.
Feature: Quality of life features for clearing or resetting multiple area entrances.
Refactor: Changed ER buttons to be more legible.
Bug Fix: Reloading pack resets ER state.
Bug Fix: Key state is reset and recalculated on AP connection.
Bug Fix: Fix multiple stage accessibility issues.
Bug Fix: Area Randomization now longer enabled automatically on AP connection, if not enabled.
Feature: Initial official release.
